page.title: 11EASTRIGGS PEOPLE'S ABILITIES
page.content:
635 questionnaires distributed, 1 to each house. 130 returned, about 1 in 5. Village totals may be estimated by multiplying sample totals by 5. Many people have valuable strengths and skills, gained through experience which cannot be measured, but which are very important. QUALIFICATIONS RECORDED:
DRIVING LICENCES: Ordinary 83; Advanced 1; Heavy goods vehicle 10; public service vehicle 2. SERVED APPRENTICESHIP: 25 SCHOOL EXAMS (O/Higher/A/CSE): 83 CITY & GUILDS: 20 ONC/HNC/OND/HND: 7 NURSING: 7 SECRETARIAL: 3 UNIVERSITY DEGREES: 6 DIPLOMAS & CERTIFICATES: 6 OTHER DIPS & CERTS: 13
